Package model

Class AbstractPiece

java.lang.Object
model.AbstractPiece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pieces
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rock
public abstract class AbstractPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pieces
Author:
Loic and Lucas

abstract class containing the common methods for all pieces in the chess game
